mapper.insert: insert into area (id, area_kbn, area_name, follow_area_id, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaKbn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update area set area_kbn = #{areaKbn,jdbcType=CHAR}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, follow_area_id = #{followAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, area_kbn, area_name, follow_area_id, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from area where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, area_kbn, area_name, follow_area_id, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from area
